answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
In Virginia Beach, VA, safety sensitive positions such as police, fire, etc., receive annual physicals and drug testing.  Also, employees who have commercial driver's licenses are tested randomly.  Should a test come back non-negative, a Medical Review Officer reviews the report.  The employee is asked to bring in a list of all valid prescribed medications as well as over the counter medications and herbals.  Only the Medical Review Officer has the ability/responsibility to make a decision on the outcome of the tests.
I am attaching the city's policy.
Hope this helps!

Here is a California ordinance:
Use of Medical Marijuana in the Workplace or at Correctional
Facilities: The medical use of marijuana need not be accommodated in the workplace, during work hours, or at any jail, correctional facility, or other penal institution. (§ 11362.785(a); Ross v. RagingWire Telecomms., Inc. (2008) 42 Cal.4th 920, 933 [under the Fair Employment and Housing Act, an employer may terminate an employee who tests positive for marijuana use].)
